properties.name: httpmethod
properties.description: Type of HTTP call, POST,GET etc.

properties.name: datareader
properties.description: Key in JSON Datasource for records.

properties.name: pagesize
properties.description: Number of records show on one page.

properties.name: enablecheckbox
properties.description: Enables checkbox for each row, this allows user for multi selection.

properties.name: groupby
properties.description: Set True for Enable group by functionality.

properties.name: groupbydataindex
properties.description: Primary dataindex name of the column for Grouping.

properties.name: columndefintion
properties.description: If you don't want to use '<amexio-data-table-column>' tag then pass JSON data.

properties.name: enablecolumnfiter
properties.description: Set false to hide Column toggle functionality.

events.name: selectedRowData
events.description: It will fire only on selection of checkbox and gives you selected record data.

events.name: rowSelect
events.description: It will gives you row clicked data.

events.name: onHeaderClick
events.description: It will gives you click event and column info.

columnProperties.name: width
columnProperties.description: Custom width for each column.Width must be in % but no need to mention %.
